content: In #23183 the emoji_closed_pr action is failing with malformed api key / unauthorised error. Maybe the wrong api key is stored in the repo?
@Bryan Gin-ge Chen, could this be a result of your recent changes?

I took a look at the log and I couldn't figure out what happened. I'm inclined to think it was just a random hiccup as the same workflow has completed successfully a few times since then: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/workflows/zulip_emoji_closed_pr.yaml
could the fact that the closed pr in question had no reference in zulip messages have anything to do with the failure?

Hmm... from a first glance at the script which searches for messages and posts the reaction, I think that shouldn't be a problem: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/master/scripts/zulip_emoji_merge_delegate.py

Pinging @Damiano Testa (who is away on holiday for a few more days) in case he has any ideas.
Sabbir Rahman has marked this topic as resolved.
this was probably a hiccup, as the action worked later on the same PR with newer commits.
Thanks for following up on this issue!
Aaron Liu has marked this topic as resolved.
